doc.name: ArrayMaximum
doc.description: Extract the maximum element from an array. This actor reads an array from the input port and sends the largest of its elements to the output port. The index of the largest element is sent to the index output port. If there is more than one entry in the array with the maximum value, then the index of the first such entry is what is produced.
doc.author: Mark Oliver
doc.port: The port producing the index of the largest element. This is port has type int.
